name: Ref
description: Base class for reference counting memory management. All objects that need automatic memory management should inherit from this class.

children.name: Node
children.description: The base element of the scene graph. A Node can contain other nodes (addChild). All visual elements in a scene inherit from Node. It provides: position, scale, rotation, anchor point, visibility, z-order, actions, scheduling, event handling.

children.name: Scene
children.description: A Scene is a container that holds all the nodes of a screen. There is always one active scene at a time. A Scene has no parent and is the root of the node tree managed by Director.

children.name: TransitionScene
children.description: Base class for scene transitions (fade, slide, flip, etc.). A TransitionScene animates outgoing and incoming scenes.

children.name: TransitionFade
children.description: Fade out the outgoing scene and then fade in the incoming scene.

children.name: TransitionSlideInL
children.description: Slide in the incoming scene from the left border.

children.name: TransitionFlipX
children.description: Flips the screen horizontally (like a card flip) to show the incoming scene.

children.name: Sprite
children.description: A Sprite is a 2D image (Texture2D or a rectangle within a SpriteFrame/atlas). Sprites can be created from files, texture regions, or sprite frames. They are the primary visual building blocks of a 2D game.

children.name: Sprite3D
children.description: Renders a 3D model (e.g. .c3b / .c3t files). Supports mesh, materials, skeleton animation.

children.name: Label
children.description: Unified text rendering node. Supports TTF fonts, bitmap fonts (BMFont), system fonts, and char maps. Provides text effects like outline, shadow, glow.
methods: createWithTTF(string text, string fontFile, float fontSize)
createWithSystemFont(string text, string font, float fontSize)

children.name: Layer
children.description: A Layer is a Node subclass that implements touch events and accelerometer handling. In modern cocos2d-x (v3+), Layer is mostly deprecated in favor of using Node + EventListeners directly.

children.name: LayerColor
children.description: A Layer that has a solid background color. Useful for dimming overlays, colored backgrounds.

children.name: LayerGradient
children.description: A Layer that draws a gradient between two colors. Supports direction vector.
methods: create(Color4B start, Color4B end, Vec2 direction)

children.name: DrawNode
children.description: Node that allows drawing primitives (lines, circles, rectangles, polygons, bezier curves). Immediate-mode style drawing API.
methods: drawSegment(Vec2 from, Vec2 to, float radius, Color4F)

children.name: ClippingNode
children.description: A node that clips (masks) its children using a stencil. Children are only visible where the stencil allows. Uses the stencil buffer for rendering.

children.name: ParticleSystem
children.description: Base particle system node. Emits and simulates particles with configurable properties (speed, gravity, life, color, etc.). Can load from .plist particle files.

children.name: ParticleFireworks
children.description: Preset particle system resembling fireworks.

children.name: ParticleFire
children.description: Preset particle system resembling fire.

children.name: ParticleSmoke
children.description: Preset particle system resembling smoke.

children.name: ParticleSnow
children.description: Preset particle system resembling falling snow.

children.name: ParticleRain
children.description: Preset particle system resembling rain.

children.name: Camera
children.description: Defines the view of the scene. Every scene has a default camera. Custom cameras can be added for multi-viewport rendering. Supports perspective and orthographic projections.
methods: createPerspective(float fov, float aspect, float near, float far)
createOrthographic(float width, float height, float near, float far)

children.name: SpriteBatchNode
children.description: Batches draw calls for sprites that use the same texture/atlas. All children must use the same Texture2D. Improves rendering performance for many sprites.

children.name: TMXTiledMap
children.description: Renders a TMX (Tiled Map Editor) map. Supports orthogonal, isometric, and hexagonal maps. Each layer is a SpriteBatchNode child.

children.name: MotionStreak
children.description: Creates a trailing streak effect behind a moving node. The streak fades over time. Useful for sword slash effects, comet tails, etc.
methods: create(float fade, float minSeg, float stroke, Color3B, string texture)

children.name: ParallaxNode
children.description: A node that simulates parallax scrolling. Each child is assigned a parallax ratio so children move at different speeds when the node moves.
methods: addChild(Node*, int z, Vec2 parallaxRatio, Vec2 positionOffset)

children.name: RenderTexture
children.description: Renders its children into an off-screen texture (FBO). Useful for screenshots, dynamic textures, post-processing effects.
methods: create(int width, int height, PixelFormat format)
beginWithClear(float r, float g, float b, float a)

children.name: ui::Widget
children.description: Base class for all UI widgets in the cocos2d-x UI system. Provides touch event handling, focus navigation, layout sizing, and widget state management.

children.name: ui::Button
children.description: A push-button widget with normal/pressed/disabled states. Supports text label on the button, scale9 sprite, and zoom effect on press.
methods: create(string normal, string selected, string disabled)

children.name: ui::Text
children.description: A text display widget (wraps Label internally). Supports TTF and system fonts.
methods: create(string text, string font, float fontSize)

children.name: ui::ImageView
children.description: Displays a static image. Supports Scale9Sprite for flexible scaling.

children.name: ui::TextField
children.description: A text input field widget. Wraps a TextFieldTTF internally. Supports placeholder text, max length, password mode.
methods: create(string placeholder, string font, int fontSize)

children.name: ui::CheckBox
children.description: A checkbox widget with checked/unchecked states. Has separate textures for background and cross mark.
methods: create(string bg, string bgSelected, string cross, ...)

children.name: ui::Slider
children.description: A slider widget for selecting a value in a range. Has a track bar and a sliding ball.

children.name: ui::Layout
children.description: Container widget that arranges children using layout algorithms (absolute, linear horizontal/vertical, relative). Supports clipping, background color/image.

children.name: ui::ScrollView
children.description: A scrollable container widget. Children can be scrolled vertically, horizontally, or both. Supports bounce effects and scroll bars.

children.name: ui::ListView
children.description: A scrollable list widget. Items can be added/removed dynamically. Supports item click events and margin between items.

children.name: ui::PageView
children.description: A page-based view for swiping through pages. Each page is a Layout.

children.name: ui::LoadingBar
children.description: A progress bar widget. Shows loading or health bar style progress from 0 to 100 percent.

children.name: ui::RichText
children.description: Displays rich text with mixed formatting: different fonts, colors, images, links, outlines. Content defined via RichElement objects.

children.name: Action
children.description: Base class for all actions. Actions animate nodes over time (move, rotate, scale, fade, etc.). Actions are applied to nodes via node->runAction(action).

children.name: FiniteTimeAction
children.description: Base class for actions that have a finite duration.

children.name: ActionInstant
children.description: Actions that execute instantly (zero duration). Useful in sequences for triggering callbacks, setting properties, etc.

children.name: Show
children.description: Instantly makes the node visible.

children.name: Hide
children.description: Instantly hides the node.

children.name: CallFunc
children.description: Calls a std::function<void()> callback instantly.

children.name: RemoveSelf
children.description: Removes the node from its parent instantly.

children.name: Place
children.description: Instantly places the node at a given position.

children.name: FlipX
children.description: Instantly flips the sprite horizontally.

children.name: FlipY
children.description: Instantly flips the sprite vertically.

children.name: ActionInterval
children.description: Base class for actions that take a specific duration to complete. Most animation actions inherit from this.

children.name: MoveTo
children.description: Moves the node to an absolute position over time.

children.name: MoveBy
children.description: Moves the node by a relative delta over time.

children.name: RotateTo
children.description: Rotates the node to an absolute angle over time.

children.name: RotateBy
children.description: Rotates the node by a relative angle over time.

children.name: ScaleTo
children.description: Scales the node to an absolute scale factor over time.
methods: create(float duration, float sx, float sy)

children.name: ScaleBy
children.description: Scales the node by a relative factor over time.

children.name: FadeIn
children.description: Fades in the node from transparent to fully opaque.

children.name: FadeOut
children.description: Fades out the node from opaque to fully transparent.

children.name: FadeTo
children.description: Fades the node to a given opacity over time.

children.name: TintTo
children.description: Tints the node to a target color over time.
methods: create(float duration, GLubyte r, GLubyte g, GLubyte b)

children.name: DelayTime
children.description: Pauses for a given duration. Useful inside a Sequence.

children.name: BezierTo
children.description: Moves the node along a cubic Bezier curve to an endpoint.

children.name: BezierBy
children.description: Moves the node along a cubic Bezier curve by relative offsets.

children.name: JumpTo
children.description: Moves the node to a position with parabolic jumps.
methods: create(float duration, Vec2 pos, float height, int jumps)

children.name: JumpBy
children.description: Moves the node by a delta with parabolic jumps.
methods: create(float duration, Vec2 delta, float height, int jumps)

children.name: Blink
children.description: Makes the node blink (toggle visibility) a given number of times.

children.name: Sequence
children.description: Runs a list of actions one after another in sequence.

children.name: Spawn
children.description: Runs a list of actions simultaneously (in parallel).

children.name: Repeat
children.description: Repeats an action a given number of times.

children.name: RepeatForever
children.description: Repeats an action indefinitely until manually stopped.

children.name: Animate
children.description: Animates a sprite through a series of SpriteFrames (frame-by-frame animation).

children.name: Follow
children.description: Makes the camera/layer follow a target node. Optionally clamps to a bounding rectangle.

children.name: Speed
children.description: Wraps an ActionInterval and changes its speed. Speed > 1 means faster, < 1 means slower.

children.name: Component
children.description: Base class for components that can be attached to nodes. Follows an Entity-Component pattern to add behaviors without subclassing.

children.name: PhysicsBody
children.description: A physics body component (Box2D or Chipmunk backend). Attach to a Node to give it physics simulation.

children.name: Director
children.description: Singleton that manages the game loop, scene stack, and OpenGL view. Controls the flow of scenes and the main game timing.

children.name: EventDispatcher
children.description: Central event system. Dispatches events to registered listeners. Handles touch, keyboard, mouse, custom events, and physics contact events.

children.name: Scheduler
children.description: Responsible for triggering scheduled callbacks. Updates are called every frame. Timers with intervals are also supported. Works closely with Director.
methods: schedule(callback, target, interval, repeat, delay, key)

children.name: EventListener
children.description: Base class for event listeners. Each listener type handles specific events (touch, keyboard, mouse, acceleration, custom).

children.name: EventListenerTouchOneByOne
children.description: Handles single touch events (began, moved, ended, cancelled). swallowTouches prevents propagation.

children.name: EventListenerTouchAllAtOnce
children.description: Handles multi-touch events (all touches delivered at once).

children.name: EventListenerKeyboard
children.description: Handles keyboard key press and release events.

children.name: EventListenerMouse
children.description: Handles mouse events (down, up, move, scroll).

children.name: EventListenerCustom
children.description: Listens for custom named events dispatched by the user.

children.name: EventListenerPhysicsContact
children.description: Handles physics contact events (begin, pre-solve, post-solve, separate).

children.name: TextureCache
children.description: Caches loaded textures so they are not loaded multiple times. Shared by the Director.

children.name: SpriteFrameCache
children.description: Caches SpriteFrame objects loaded from sprite sheet plist files. Used with TextureAtlas/SpriteBatchNode for efficient rendering.

children.name: FileUtils
children.description: Singleton for file system access. Provides search paths, reading files, checking existence. Platform-abstracted.

children.name: AudioEngine
children.description: Cross-platform audio engine for playing music and sound effects. Replaced the older SimpleAudioEngine.
methods: play2d(string filepath, bool loop, float volume)
